fields.label: Title
fields.description: Friendly name for this intake. Use something meaningful like 'Bb Clarinet Pads – Bench 2 – 2025‑08‑20'.

fields.label: Photo
fields.description: Upload a top‑down photo of the pads on a matte dark background. Keep the ArUco marker flat in the same plane. Shortest image side ≥ 2000 px. Avoid glare and blur.

fields.label: Processed Preview
fields.description: Auto‑generated overlay showing detected pads. Review the green circles to confirm the count before approval.

fields.label: Detections Meta
fields.description: JSON file with detection details (x, y, r, confidence, method, quality metrics). Useful for audit and troubleshooting.

fields.label: Item
fields.description: ERPNext Item to update (must be a Stock Item). Example: 'Clarinet Pad – 10 mm'.

fields.label: Warehouse
fields.description: Warehouse where stock will be adjusted. The Company is inferred automatically from this warehouse.

fields.label: Company
fields.description: Company owning the selected Warehouse. Filled automatically.

fields.label: UOM
fields.description: Unit of Measure for the inventory update, typically 'Nos' or 'Each'.

fields.label: Detected Count
fields.description: Auto count from image processing. Always verify against the Processed Preview before approving.

fields.label: Approved Count
fields.description: Human‑verified final count. This drives the inventory delta by default. Edit if the preview missed or over‑counted any pads.

fields.label: Inventory Action
fields.description: Choose how stock should be adjusted: Increase (Material Receipt), Decrease (Material Issue), or No Change (for review only).

fields.label: Inventory Delta
fields.description: Quantity to post to stock. Defaults to Approved Count. You may override for partial postings or adjustments.

fields.label: Review Status
fields.description: Workflow state: Pending Review → Approved (ready to post) or Needs Fix (retake photo, adjust settings, or reprocess).

fields.label: Quality OK
fields.description: Auto quality gate. Unchecked means blur/lighting/perspective are sub‑optimal—consider retaking the photo.

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Free‑form notes for this intake (e.g., photo conditions, pad sizes mix, any anomalies).

fields.label: Processing Params
fields.description: Advanced: tweak only if counts are off. For most cases, leave defaults or use Auto Pixel Radius from mm below.

fields.label: Min Radius (px)
fields.description: Minimum pad radius in pixels. If using Auto Pixel Radius from mm, this updates automatically after processing.

fields.label: Max Radius (px)
fields.description: Maximum pad radius in pixels. If using Auto Pixel Radius from mm, this updates automatically after processing.

fields.label: Hough dp
fields.description: Hough Circles inverse ratio of accumulator to image resolution. 1.2–2.0 is typical; lower can improve sensitivity.

fields.label: param1 (Canny)
fields.description: Canny high threshold for Hough pre‑processing. Raise to reduce noise; lower to detect faint edges.

fields.label: param2 (Accumulator)
fields.description: Hough accumulator threshold. Higher = fewer detections (more strict). Lower if pads are missed.

fields.label: Gaussian Blur (odd)
fields.description: Smoothing kernel size (odd number). Use 5–9 to reduce noise; too high may erase edges.

fields.label: No‑ML Calibration
fields.description: Use the printable ArUco marker to auto‑set pad size from real‑world millimeters and de‑skew the image.

fields.label: Use ArUco Marker
fields.description: Enable to use the printed ArUco marker for scale and perspective correction. Keep the marker flat in the photo.

fields.label: ArUco Dictionary
fields.options:
DICT_4X4_50
DICT_4X4_100
DICT_5X5_50
DICT_5X5_100
DICT_6X6_50
DICT_6X_100
DICT_APRILTAG_36h11
fields.description: Dictionary used to generate/recognize the marker. Use the same value as printed in your Shooting Kit PDF.

fields.label: Marker Side Length (mm)
fields.description: Physical side length of the printed marker in millimeters (e.g., 50). This ensures millimeter‑accurate pixel scaling.

fields.label: Pad Diameter (mm)
fields.description: Typical pad diameter in millimeters (e.g., 9–12 for clarinet). Used to auto‑compute pixel radius bounds.

fields.label: Auto Pixel Radius From mm
fields.description: When enabled, min/max pixel radius is derived from the pad diameter and the detected marker scale.

fields.label: History
fields.description: System‑generated log of processing and inventory actions for audit.

fields.label: Count Logs
fields.description: Event log: processing runs, approvals, and inventory postings with user and timestamp.

fields.label: Actions
fields.description: Use the top toolbar buttons: Download/Generate Shooting Kit (PDF), Process Image, Approve Count, and Update Inventory.

fields.label: Processed At
fields.description: Timestamp when the most recent image processing completed.

fields.label: Approved At
fields.description: Timestamp when the Approved Count was last set.

fields.label: Stock Entry
fields.description: Link to the Stock Entry created by Update Inventory. Click to open the voucher.
